name: Paradox Verge
description:
Shaking hands. Four customers. A green gramophone. One night of redemption and recurrence.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Installation Instructions :

Extract the RAR file to your machine
Go into Paradox Verge
Run "Spooktober_2D.exe"
